definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
Mount of Olives (in the Christian passion story)

sentences.english: Football is played in all weathers, including rain and snow.
sentences.chinese: 可以在气候下玩橄榄球，包括雨天和雪天。

sentences.english: He is wearing an olive green coat.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着件橄榄绿的外套。

sentences.english: Lunar olivine was created by great volcanoes called fire fountains, which sprayed superheated lava into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月之橄榄石产生于名为“火喷泉”的巨型火山。

sentences.english: It is made of Magnesium and Iron Silicate , and it is a member of the Chrysolite mineral family.
sentences.chinese: 它是由镁，矽铁，它是一个成员橄榄石矿物家庭。

sentences.english: Our famous football team have put our town on the map.
sentences.chinese: 我们著名的橄榄球队使我们镇出了名。

sentences.english: We can extract oil from olive.
They referred to my olive-skinned sister as “the Arab.”
sentences.chinese: 他们称我的有着橄榄色皮肤的姐姐为“阿拉伯人”。

sentences.english: Bacon Bits , Parmesans Cheese , Black Olive .
sentences.chinese: 核桃，银鱼柳，培根末，帕玛森芝士，黑橄榄。

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食盐，柠檬汁，孜然粉，橄榄油和胡椒粉调味。

sentences.english: It's a mix between football, basketball and hockey with trampolines thrown in.
sentences.chinese: 有包括橄榄球，篮球以及曲棍球，利用蹦床弹跳发球。

sentences.english: They called off the football match because of a severe thunderstorm.
sentences.chinese: 因为暴雨太大了，他们把橄榄球赛取消了。

sentences.english: This resembles volcanic ash, which is predominantly composed of minerals such as pyroxene and olivine.
sentences.chinese: 这类似于火山灰，这是主要组成矿物如辉石和橄榄石。

sentences.english: Olive oil is basic to paella.
sentences.chinese: 橄榄油是海鲜饭的基本佐料。

sentences.english: Compressing the bottom of a ceramic olive oil bottle eliminates S cracks.
sentences.chinese: 压缩了陶瓷橄榄油瓶底部裂缝消除S。

definition: litchi or lychee fruit (Litchi chinensis Sonn.)
